message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be very valuable to you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. I could be persuaded to let it go for $12,800. This offer represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,200. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
